actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to correct technical errors in the rules for buildings in progress on the termination date of the low-income housing credit.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise the transitional rules for bond-financed buildings in progress on the termination date of the low-income housing credit.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to correct technical errors in the rules for buildings in progress on the termination date of the low-income housing credit.
